title: Brussels Sprouts
directions: Press "Saut√©" and "Adjust" so it's on "More". When it reads "Hot, add the bacon and almonds, stirring often. Cook for 3-4 minutes so bacon is nice and cooked (it's okay if it sticks a little to the pan and when the bottom of the pan is pretty brown, that's your cue that it's done cooking)
Mix all of the liquids and seasonings together in a bowl to create the sauce
Put the Brussels Sprouts in the Instant Pot and add sauce. Stir until everything is coated.
Secure lid and set on "Manual" High Pressure for 3 minutes
ingredients: 1.5 - 2 lbs of Brussels Sprouts, halved with bottom stalk cut off
4 strips thick bacon, chopped (kitchen shears come in very handy here). The bacon is also TOTALLY optional in case you're a vegetarian. It just adds additional flavor
1/4 tsp of crushed red pepper flakes*
